```{r csv function}

library(tidyverse)

load_csv <- function(csv_name){
  
  data <- read_csv(toString(paste(csv_name, ".csv.gz", sep="")))
  #data[data$runtimeMinutes == "\\N", "runtimeMinutes"] <- NA
  for (col in colnames(data)){
    data[data[,col] == "\\N", col] = NA
  }
  return (data)
  
  #save(data, file = toString(paste(csv_name, ".rda", sep="")))
}

basics <- load_csv("title_basics_sample")
```
